wiki.content:
A Message is a track from Coldplay's 4th album, X&Y. After lead singer Chris Martin let close friends hear a preview of the album before release, one commented saying that X&Y was "missing something". Martin wrote A Message in the middle of the night, describing it as "the only Coldplay song I've written without clothes on". 
 
 In 2005 in Q Magazine, Martin stated "A Message is my favourite song, it's the simplest. It arrived with 10 days of recording left so it was very exciting to do. It took a day and a half to record."
 
 The lyrics of the song were inspired by the hymn 'My Song Is Love Unknown'.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

In 2005 in Q Magazine, Martin stated "A Message is my favourite song, it's the simplest. It arrived with 10 days of recording left so it was very exciting to do. It took a day and a half to record."

track.name: A Message
comments: I love you people, V(bellow)V and the future above ;)
I could really see/hear U2 doing this justice!
The 'I love you, pleaaaase come hoooome' gives me a big smile on my face every time I hear it. [2]
one of my favorite coldplay songs :)
The 'I love you, pleaaaase come hoooome' gives me a big smile on my face every time I hear it.
you don't have to be alone <3
mylo xyloto wahr ja ma scheisse, aber solche songs zeigen, dass coldplay das auch mal besser konnte.
One of the best. Coldplay, forever my favourite band since Parachutes.
